ticket.title: AR tests suite warnings
ticket.original-body:
when running tests in AR you get these warnings:
./test/cases/adapter_test.rb:148: warning: ambiguous first argument; put parentheses or even spaces ./test/cases/adapter_test.rb:149: warning: ambiguous first argument; put parentheses or even spaces ./test/cases/adapter_test.rb:154: warning: ambiguous first argument; put parentheses or even spaces ./test/cases/adapter_test.rb:155: warning: ambiguous first argument; put parentheses or even spaces
patch attached to fix this.
